Description: Marble tombstone with six lines of foliated kufic script including the name of the deceased, 'Abd al-Hamid ibn Hayyun al-Kitabi, and the date of his death, 435 AH/1044 AD. Surrounded by border. Right side broken. Fatimid Egyptian.
Associated names: Named in inscription: `Abd al-Hamid ibn Hayyun al-Kitabi
Acquisition notes: Brooke Sewell Permanent Fund. This was acquired from the daughter of a Belgian collector, Mr. Desenfants, who lived in Egypt in the 1950s and ran a textile business there.
